    Class Description
    AfterSelectedAggregateActionState
    State of the player after selecting an AggregateAction
    AggregateAction
    This class represents an aggregate action.
    AggregateActionCommandMessage
    This class wraps an instance of AggregateActionID during transfer from server to client.
    AggregateActionID
    Contains every legal type of AggregateAction
    AggregateActionTest
    Tests for AggregateAction and AggregateActionID methods
    AmmoTile
    This class represents a single ammo tile
    AmmoTileDeck
    Deck of multiple AmmoTile
    AmmoTileView
    This class represent an AmmoTile on view side.
    AmmoTileViewTest  
    CardinalDirection
    Contains the four basic cardinal directions
    ChoosingWeaponOptionState
    State of the player while choosing a WeaponMode
    ChoosingWeaponState
    State of the player while choosing which Weapon to use
    Cli
    This class manage Command Line Interface as User Interface.
    Client
    This class represent a client regardless of the type of connection (Rmi or Socket)
    ClientReception
    This class allows to manage parallel client enrollments.
    CliManager
    This class manages the printing of game on command line interface.
    CliTest  
    Color
    Contains all the possible ammo-cubes' colors Color.BLUE Color.RED Color.YELLOW
    ColorCommandMessage
    This class wraps an instance of Color during transfer from server to client.
    Command
    This interface must be implemented by every command.
    CommandMessage
    A command message is a subset of the command that contains only the necessary information for its display to the clients
    CommandsTest
    Tests some Commands
    CommandType
    Contains all possible type of command message that server can send to client.
    CommandViewTransfer
    This class wraps a list of CommandMessage during transfer from server to client.
    ConcreteView
    This class represents the client-side view.
    Connection
    Contains all possible connections between two Squares
    Deck
    Represents a deck of cards
    DiscardingWeaponState
    State of the player while discarding a weapon
    DoneCommand
    This command change the player state from currentState to nextState
    EffectCommand
    This command represent an effect that a weapon can have on a single player
    EffectCommandMessage
    This class represents a command containing a weapon's effect.
    GameBoard
    This class represents the game map
    GameBoardTest
    Contains tests for GameBoard's methods
    GameCountDown
    This class manage the countdown after the minimum players number is reached.
    GrabCommand
    This commands represent a grab action
    GrabTileCommand
    This command represent the action of grab a tile
    Gui
    This class manages Graphical User Interface as User Interface.
    GuiManager
    This class manages Graphical User Interface as User Interface.
    IdleState
    State of the player when it's not its turn and it has not been shot
    IllegalUndoException
    Thrown when an UN-doable Command Command.undo() method is invoked
    ImageCache
    This class allows image cashing.
    Lock  
    LoginWindow
    This class represents the window shown during login.
    MainGuiController
    This class is the controller of the main GUI
    ManageTurnState
    Main state of the player
    Match
    Represents the Match, Contains the state of the match
    MatchController
    This class manages an entire match.
    MatchControllerTest
    Contains tests for MatchController's methods
    MatchTest
    Tests for Match's methods
    MatchView
    This class represent an Match on view side.
    MatchViewTransfer
    This class wraps an instance of MatchView during transfer from server to client.
    Message
    This class represents a message used to communicate on a network.
    ModelView
    This class represent the entire Model on view side.
    MovableState
    States when the player can move
    MoveCommand
    This command represents a move action
    Parser
    This class represents a parser that can serialize and deserialize objects Hides which library is used
    PayReloadBeforeShotCommand
    This command actualize the payment for the reload before the shoot for the action possible only in the final round
    PayReloadWeaponCommand
    This command actualize the payment for the reload of a weapon
    PayScopeCommand
    This command actualize the payment for the scope
    PayWeaponCommand
    This command represents the action of buy a weapon
    PayWeaponOptionCommand
    This command actualize the payment for the weapon's option selected
    PendingPaymentReloadBeforeShotState
    State when the player is paying to reload a weapon
    PendingPaymentReloadWeaponState

    PendingPaymentScopeState
    State when the player is paying to use a Scope power up
    PendingPaymentState
    States when the player is paying to use something
    PendingPaymentWeaponOptionState
    State when the player is paying to use a weapon mode
    PendingPaymentWeaponState
    State when the player is paying to buy a Weapon
    Player
    Contains all player's data
    PlayerBoardController
    This class manages the player board show on gui.

    PlayerState
    This interface must be implemented by every PlayerState.
    PlayerTest
    Contains tests for Player's methods

    This class represent an Player on view side.

    RespawnCommand
    This command represent the reSpawn action
    RmiClient
    This class represent a client using rmi connection and implements the Rmi-client interface exposed to rmi server.
    RmiClientInterface
    This interface exposes some rmi-client's methods rmi-server can call.
    RmiCommunication
    This class represent a single communication between server and client according to rmi technology.
    RmiServer
    This class represent the server for communications using rmi, implementing the interface exposed to rmi client.
    RmiServerInterface
    This interface exposes some rmi-server's methods rmi-client can call.
    RuntimeTypeAdapterFactory<T>
    Adapts values whose runtime type may differ from their declaration type.

    State when the player uses a Scope power up
